needs to be placed into keybindgs.json
[
    {
        "key": "ctrl+alt+c",
        "command": "macros.latex_code_word"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+i",
        "command": "macros.italic_latex"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+alt+p",
        "command": "macros.markdown_code_block"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+m",
        "command": "macros.latex_math"
    }
]
